nodes.text: The Shani were a sentient species of feathered reptilians who possessed long lifespans. The Hutts considered the Shani to be the galaxy's original bounty hunters. They had the ability to open their mouths extremely wide, and had sharp teeth and pointy tongues. One prominent Shani was the bounty hunter Deva Lompop, who lived from the High Republic Era through to the Imperial Era.
